pr_title: Fix BCompileUtil to fail only on compilation errors

timeline.message: Fix BCompileUtil to fail only on compilation errors

timeline.bodyText: We can use findAny function instead finding the count since there is no usage of the count - https://www.baeldung.com/java-stream-findfirst-vs-findany
timeline.author: hemikak

replies.bodyText: @hemikak WDYT of using anyMatch(predicate) instead? IMO it'll be more convenient for the above context, if we don't need the exact count.
replies.author: NipunaRanasinghe
